data.persona: I am provided a special place to sleep. I may be tired after my travels. I am furnished with warm hospitality and a good meal.
data.description:
You are in the mansion entrance.
The mansion entrance room is very large and you can see up multiple stories. There is natural light from stained glass windows. The floors and the staircase at the far side of the room are made of fine marble. There are paintings of the baron and his family on the walls. There are ornate decorations and trinkets on tables against the wall.
The butler is here.

You are carrying an umbrella, a purse, a flower, and an sleeping bag, and wearing a dress and a ceremonial hat.

data.short_motivation: I want to give a reward to the butler
data.mid_motivation: I plan to leave the mansion today
data.long_motivation: I hope to come back in a few weeks
